Desc.entry: Railcard is valid for either 12 months or 3 years. Details of eligibility and the application form can be found in the "Rail Travel Made Easy" booklet, available from principal staffed train stations, by telephoning the Disabled Persons Railcard Office or by downloading the form from the website.

Telephone.entry: postal application and Railcard renewal enquiries

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: No personal callers, please contact by telephone or letter only
